text.name: Unbrilliant Glory - Flowing
text.desc:
[CantDuel]
When used for the first time in battle, consume 1 fewer Wrath, 2 fewer Sloth, and 1 fewer Pride E.G.O resources.
At 1+ [MlynarWaiting], activate Unbrilliant Glory - Incandescence instead
This Skill does not hit an enemy, does not trigger Defense Skills, and external effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [MlynarWaiting]
[EndSkill] Heal 25 SP
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [AttackUp] next turn

[CantDuel]
When used for the first time in battle, consume 1 fewer Wrath, 2 fewer Sloth, and 1 fewer Pride E.G.O resources.

passiveList.name: Wanderer
passiveList.desc:
Gain [MlynarWaiting] when meeting one of the following conditions:
- Gain 1 for every 3 HP damage taken from getting hit
- Gain 1 for every 5 Shield HP damage taken from getting hit
- Gain 10 per Staggered ally when other allies become Staggered
- Gain 20 per dead ally when other allies are killed

Turn Start: if this unit is Staggered due to damage, and if this unit has 40+ [MlynarWaiting], fix all of this unit's Resistance values to 2 for the turn and recover from Stagger (once per Encounter; unless it's a forced Stagger)

text.name: Unbrilliant Glory - Flowing
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] At 40 [MlynarWaiting], Base Power +1

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [MlynarWaiting] and gain the following effects(all of them rounded down):
- Gain (Stack consumed / 10) [DefenseUp] (once per turn)
- If 40 Stack was consumed, the final Coin deals +110% damage and this unit gains 2 [Protection] (once per turn)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +3% damage for every 6 ([Combustion] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 15%)
[BeforeAttack] Base Power -4 for every Cracked Coin (max -16)
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [MlynarWaiting]
[EndBattle] If 40 [MlynarWaiting] was consumed by this Skill, the leftmost Skill Slot on the Dashboard gains +8 [Aggro] next turn (once per turn)
coinDescs: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If target has 15+ [Vibration] Potency, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Unbrilliant Glory - Flowing
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
When attacking 3+ targets: If the Coins 1~3 hit without Cracking, the final Coin deals +25% damage (once per Coin; in Focused Encounters, each Part counts as 1 target)
[WhenUse] At 40 [MlynarWaiting], Base Power +1

[BeforeAttack] Consume all [MlynarWaiting] and gain the following effects(all of them rounded down):
- Gain (Stack consumed / 10) [DefenseUp] (once per turn)
- If 40 Stack was consumed, the final Coin deals +130% damage and this unit gains 2 [Protection] (once per turn)

[BeforeAttack] Deal +3% damage for every 6 ([Combustion] + [Vibration]) on the main target (max 15%)
[BeforeAttack] Base Power -4 for every Cracked Coin (max -16)
[EndSkill] Gain 1 [MlynarWaiting]
[EndBattle] If 40 [MlynarWaiting] was consumed by this Skill, the leftmost Skill Slot on the Dashboard gains +8 [Aggro] next turn (once per turn)
coinDescs: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] If target has 15+ [Vibration] Potency, trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
